howItWorks.title: With Mythoria, creating your own story is easy:

step1.title: Choose your character(s)
step1.description: Select your children, grandchildren, or any special young person in your life.

step2.title: Tell us about their passions and superpowers
step2.description: What do they love? What makes them unique? This is where the magic begins!

step3.title: Choose your adventure
step3.description: Pick from our collection of magical adventures or create your own.

step4.title: Receive your personalized book
step4.description: In just a few minutes, your story will be ready. You can read it digitally or order a physical copy.

step5.title: Fully customize with unique details!
step5.description: Write or simply speak about all the little details you'd like included. Even include specific products, services, or meaningful family traditions.

step6.title: Choose your gift format
step6.description: Receive your personalized story as a beautiful hardcover book, a digital ebook, or an engaging audiobook.

howItWorks.conclusion: We'll take care of everything else, powered by the magic of Artificial Intelligence!

AboutUs.title: Hello! My name is Rodrigo and I'm almost 18 years old.

paragraphs.p1: I grew up fascinated by the adventures my father invented, stories that fed my imagination and taught me that each of us can be the hero of incredible adventures.
paragraphs.p2: Today, I not only love listening to stories, but I also love creating them. I'm passionate about Artificial Intelligence and discovered that AI can help build fantastic worlds and unforgettable characters. I particularly enjoy creating stories to tell my younger brother, turning each narrative into a unique and personal experience.
paragraphs.p3: When I first used ChatGPT, I was amazed by the potential of this technology. Since then, I have been exploring the infinite possibilities that AI offers to personalize and enhance storytelling.
paragraphs.p4: Can a 17-year-old create an innovative company using only Artificial Intelligence? Driven by this ambition and curiosity, Mythoria was born‚Äîa project dedicated to creating fully personalized books, where each child becomes the hero of their own adventure.
paragraphs.tagline: Mythoria is more than just a book: it's your own story.
